001
002import java.io.File;
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.List;
005
006/**
007 * find songs
008 *
009 * @author matecsaba
010 */
011public class findSongs {
012
013    /**
014     * list of found files
015     */
016    protected List<playerSong> lst = new ArrayList<playerSong>();
017
018    /**
019     * artist
020     */
021    protected String art;
022
023    /**
024     * album
025     */
026    protected String alb;
027
028    /**
029     * date
030     */
031    protected String dat;
032
033    /**
034     * title
035     */
036    protected String tit;
037
038    /**
039     * the main
040     *
041     * @param args arguments
042     */
043    public static void main(String[] args) {
044        String s = "./";
045        if (args.length > 0) {
046            s = args[0];
047        }
048        playerUtil.put("scanning " + s);
049        findSongs fs = new findSongs();
050        fs.doFind(s);
051        fs.doSort();
052        if (args.length > 2) {
053            playerUtil.put("diffing");
054            List<playerSong> old = playerSong.txt2pls(null, playerUtil.readup(args[2]));
055            fs.doMerge(old);
056            findSongs frs = new findSongs();
057            frs.lst.addAll(fs.lst);
058            frs.lst.removeAll(old);
059            frs.doTitle();
060        }
061        s = s.replaceAll("/", "-");
062        if (args.length > 1) {
063            s = args[1];
064        }
065        playerUtil.saveas(playerSong.pls2txt(fs.lst), s);
066    }
067
068    /**
069     * sort files
070     */
071    protected void doSort() {
072        playerSong.sort(lst);
073    }
074
075    /**
076     * find files
077     *
078     * @param s directory, without leading /
079     */
080    protected void doFind(String s) {
081        playerUtil.put("processing " + s + "...");
082        File[] fl;
083        try {
084            fl = new File(s).listFiles();
085        } catch (Exception e) {
086            return;
087        }
088        if (fl == null) {
089            return;
090        }
091        for (int i = 0; i < fl.length; i++) {
092            String a = fl[i].getName();
093            if (a.startsWith(".")) {
094                continue;
095            }
096            if (fl[i].isDirectory()) {
097                doFind(s + "/" + a);
098                continue;
099            }
100            int o = a.lastIndexOf(".");
101            if (o < 0) {
102                continue;
103            }
104            String b = a.substring(o, a.length()).toLowerCase() + ".";
105            if (".mp3.m4a.flac.wav.wma.".indexOf(b) < 0) {
106                continue;
107            }
108            playerSong sng = new playerSong();
109            sng.file = s + "/" + a;
110            sng.title = a.substring(0, o);
111            lst.add(sng);
112        }
113    }
114
115    /**
116     * merge from old
117     *
118     * @param src old list
119     */
120    protected void doMerge(List<playerSong> src) {
121        for (int i = 0; i < src.size(); i++) {
122            playerSong ntry = src.get(i);
123            int o = playerSong.find(lst, ntry);
124            if (o < 0) {
125                continue;
126            }
127            lst.remove(o);
128            lst.add(ntry);
129        }
130    }
131
132    /**
133     * fetch titles
134     */
135    protected void doTitle() {
136        for (int i = 0; i < lst.size(); i++) {
137            doTitle(lst.get(i), true);
138        }
139    }
140
141    /**
142     * fetch titles
143     */
144    protected void doDir() {
145        for (int i = 0; i < lst.size(); i++) {
146            doTitle(lst.get(i), false);
147            if (art == null) {
148                continue;
149            }
150            if (alb == null) {
151                continue;
152            }
153            if (dat == null) {
154                continue;
155            }
156            break;
157        }
158    }
159
160    /**
161     * fetch title
162     *
163     * @param sng song to update
164     * @param cln clean findings
165     * @return false on success, true on error;
166     */
167    protected boolean doTitle(playerSong sng, boolean cln) {
168        String cm[] = new String[2];
169        cm[0] = "ffprobe";
170        cm[1] = sng.file;
171        playerUtil.put("--> song " + cm[1] + " <--");
172        Process prc;
173        try {
174            Runtime rtm = Runtime.getRuntime();
175            prc = rtm.exec(cm);
176            prc.waitFor();
177        } catch (Exception e) {
178            playerUtil.put("failed to exec!");
179            return true;
180        }
181        playerLyric res = playerUtil.doRead(prc.getErrorStream());
182        if (res == null) {
183            playerUtil.put("failed to fetch!");
184            return true;
185        }
186        if (cln) {
187            art = null;
188            alb = null;
189            dat = null;
190            tit = null;
191        }
192        for (int i = 0; i < res.size(); i++) {
193            String a = res.get(i).trim();
194            int o = a.indexOf(":");
195            if (o < 0) {
196                continue;
197            }
198            String b = a.substring(o + 1, a.length()).trim();
199            a = a.substring(0, o).toLowerCase().trim();
200            if (a.equals("artist")) {
201                art = b;
202                continue;
203            }
204            if (a.equals("album")) {
205                alb = b;
206                continue;
207            }
208            if (a.equals("date")) {
209                dat = b;
210                continue;
211            }
212            if (a.equals("title")) {
213                tit = b;
214                continue;
215            }
216        }
217        if (art == null) {
218            playerUtil.put("no artist!");
219            return true;
220        }
221        if (tit == null) {
222            playerUtil.put("no title!");
223            return true;
224        }
225        sng.title = art + " - " + tit;
226        playerUtil.put("got: " + sng.title);
227        return false;
228    }
229
230}
